Container.Name: everything-search
Container.Overview: Everything Search is a fast file search utility for Windows, now running in Docker with Wine and accessible via web interface. This container runs the Windows version using Wine and provides access via a secure web interface (noVNC). Features include selectable executable via EVERYTHING_BIN environment variable, Everything HTTP Server, ETP Server, and Server components. Multi-arch support (amd64 and i386) with optimized architecture-specific images.

Config.Name: VNC Port
Config.Description: VNC Web Interface port for accessing Everything Search GUI

Config.Name: Alternative VNC Port
Config.Description: Alternative VNC port for direct VNC access

Config.Description: Everything Search config directory (contains everything.ini and Plugins-1.5a.ini)

Config.Name: Everything Database Directory

Config.Name: Container Config Directory
Config.Description: Container configuration directory (VNC passwords, certificates) - base image requirement

Config.Description: Everything Search config file path (relative to /home/everything, e.g., cfg/everything.ini). Defaults to cfg/everything.ini

Config.Name: Everything Database Path
Config.Description: Everything Search database file path (relative to /home/everything, e.g., db/everything.db). Defaults to db/everything.db

Config.Name: Unraid User Shares

Config.Name: Everything Binary
Config.Description: Everything Search executable to run (e.g., everything-1.5.exe, everything-1.4.exe, es.exe, voidimageviewer.exe)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for the container (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London)

Config.Name: Display Width
Config.Description: Display width for VNC interface

Config.Name: Display Height
Config.Description: Display height for VNC interface

Config.Name: Secure Connection
Config.Description: Use secure connection to GUI (0=disabled, 1=enabled)

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: User ID for the container

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Group ID for the container

Config.Name: Umask
Config.Description: Umask for file permissions

Config.Name: Display
Config.Description: X11 display for GUI

Config.Name: Wine Debug
Config.Description: Wine debug settings

Config.Name: Wine Architecture
Config.Description: Wine architecture (win64 for 64-bit, win32 for 32-bit)

Config.Name: Wine No Async Directory
Config.Description: Disable async directory operations in Wine (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Can help prevent deadlocks. Default: 1

Config.Name: Dark Mode
Config.Description: Enable dark mode for the web interface (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Default: 1

Config.Name: Clean Temp Directory
Config.Description: Clean temporary directory on startup (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Disable for debugging. Default: 1

Config.Name: Keep App Running
Config.Description: Keep container running even if Everything crashes (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Useful for debugging. Default: 0

Config.Name: VNC Password
Config.Description: VNC password for direct VNC access (leave empty to use default 'vncpassword'). Set a custom password for security.

Config.Name: VNC Localhost Only
Config.Description: Restrict VNC access to localhost only (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Improves security. Default: 0

Config.Name: Web Localhost Only
Config.Description: Restrict web interface access to localhost only (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Improves security. Default: 0

Config.Name: Web Authentication
Config.Description: Enable username/password authentication for web interface (0=disabled, 1=enabled). Requires username and password to be set. Default: 0

Config.Name: Web Authentication Username
Config.Description: Username for web interface authentication (required if WEB_AUTHENTICATION is enabled)

Config.Name: Web Authentication Password
Config.Description: Password for web interface authentication (required if WEB_AUTHENTICATION is enabled)

Config.Name: GPU Device
Config.Description: GPU device for hardware acceleration (requires compatible GPU with open-source drivers like amdgpu, i915, or nouveau). Leave empty to disable.
